description: Highest prime dividing sum{k=0 to n}[ k!(n-k)! ].
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..167
maple: for n from 1 to 33 do s := 0:for k from 0 to n do s := s+k!*(n-k)!:od: ifactor(s); od;
prog: (PARI) a(n) = my(f = factor(sum(k=0, n, k!*(n-k)!))); f[#f~,1]; \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 18 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_
extensions: More terms from Andrew Gacek (andrew(AT)dgi.net), Apr 21 2000
